content: I've been trying to switch to more sustainable products for a while now, about three months, and I've managed to make some changes in my daily routine. I've replaced my plastic toothbrush with a bamboo one and started using reusable bags, beeswax wraps, and stainless steel straws. I'm now looking to make a change in my laundry detergent, but I'm not sure which one to choose. Do you have any recommendations for a beginner like me?
